subject: Dear sir,
body:
Dear sir,
You are advised to send the fee through Western Union Money Transfer in
Two ways $1,000 and $770 with the same name  below information.
Receiver's Name: Q. M.
Address: matine GA 30557 USA ($1,000)
Receiver's Name: Q. M.
Address:  matine GA 30557 USA ($770)
and send the payment information to us as soon as you send the money.
or you can send the money through our Bitcoin wallet address below.
Address; 1AgHDhj5t6xcd2jBbL4xfDfBAYcx2VkjBg
and send the screenshot of the transaction.
Yours Faithful
Edwin Clark.

subject: Re:   Dear sir,
body:
Dear Edwin Clark,

Thank you for your response. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding with the payment. 

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the purpose of this fee? I want to understand what exactly this fee is covering.

Secondly, could you please provide me with a receipt or some form of documentation that confirms my payment once it has been made? This is for my personal records and to ensure transparency in our transaction.

Lastly, I am not familiar with Bitcoin transactions. Could you please provide more information on how to proceed with this method of payment?

I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Nicholas
